    public class PhotoModel
extends java.lang.Object

      • read

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<model.User> read()
        Reads the file from DAT_FILE_PATH to deserialize and load data.
        Returns:
        an observable list that has all the old data, or a new list with admin/stock preloaded.
